column1: by selling ‘කඩයප්යන්’ was taken away. It was also her position that she was not
taken to the Modara police as claimed, but only to the Borella police.
PW-02 Sub Inspector Presanna who was a police sergeant at that time relevant
to  the  detection  has  given  evidence  to  corroborate  the  evidence  of  PW-01.  His
evidence has been similar to that of the PW-01 as to how the arrest was made
and  the  recovery  of  the  productions  from  the  possession  of  the  appellant.  His
appellant was in the following denominations.
